name: Dark GWJ
description:
Browse the Gamers with Jobs forums with less eye strain! "Free the Width" fix by Liquidmantis is included (http://userstyles.org/styles/39933/gwj-free-the-width) with an improvement to allow the responsive stylesheet to take over at narrow widths.

On github: https://github.com/noahm/dark-gwj
